definition[0]: used to say that an amount is not great
example[0]: You may need to do a certain amount of work in the evenings.
example[1]: I do agree with his ideas to a certain extent.
definition[1]: enough of a particular quality to be noticed

definition[2]: used to talk about someone you do not know but whose name you have been told
